ayahs.indonesian: Apabila langit terbelah,
ayahs.english: When the sky has split [open]

ayahs.indonesian: dan patuh kepada Tuhannya, dan sudah semestinya patuh,
ayahs.english: And has listened to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila bumi diratakan,
ayahs.english: And when the earth has been extended

ayahs.indonesian: dan memuntahkan apa yang ada di dalamnya dan menjadi kosong,
ayahs.english: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]

ayahs.indonesian: dan patuh kepada Tuhannya, dan sudah semestinya patuh.
ayahs.english: And has listened to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]

ayahs.arabic: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
ayahs.transliteration: Ya ayyuha alinsanu innaka kadihun ila rabbika kadhan famulaqeeh
ayahs.indonesian: Wahai manusia! Sesungguhnya kamu telah bekerja keras menuju Tuhanmu, maka kamu akan menemui-Nya.
ayahs.english: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.

ayahs.indonesian: Adapun orang yang diberikan kitabnya dari sebelah kanannya,
ayahs.english: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,

ayahs.indonesian: maka dia akan diperiksa dengan pemeriksaan yang mudah,
ayahs.english: He will be judged with an easy account

ayahs.indonesian: dan dia akan kembali kepada keluarganya (yang sama-sama beriman) dengan gembira.
ayahs.english: And return to his people in happiness.

ayahs.arabic: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
ayahs.transliteration: Waamma man ootiya kitabahu waraa thahrihi
ayahs.indonesian: Adapun orang yang diberikan kitabnya dari belakang,
ayahs.english: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,

ayahs.indonesian: maka dia akan berteriak, 'Celakalah aku!'
ayahs.english: He will cry out for destruction

ayahs.indonesian: dan dia akan masuk ke dalam api yang menyala-nyala (neraka).
ayahs.english: And burn in a Blaze.

ayahs.indonesian: Sesungguhnya dia (di dunia) bergembira di kalangan keluarganya (yang sesat).
ayahs.english: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;

ayahs.indonesian: Sesungguhnya dia mengira bahwa dia tidak akan kembali (kepada Tuhannya).
ayahs.english: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].

ayahs.arabic: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
ayahs.transliteration: Bala inna rabbahu kana bihi baseeran
ayahs.indonesian: Tidak demikian, sesungguhnya Tuhannya selalu melihatnya.
ayahs.english: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.

ayahs.indonesian: Maka Aku bersumpah demi cahaya merah di waktu senja,
ayahs.english: So I swear by the twilight glow

ayahs.indonesian: dan demi malam serta apa yang diselubunginya,
ayahs.english: And [by] the night and what it envelops

ayahs.indonesian: dan demi bulan apabila menjadi purnama,
ayahs.english: And [by] the moon when it becomes full

ayahs.indonesian: sungguh, kamu akan melalui tingkat demi tingkat (dalam kehidupan).
ayahs.english: You will surely experience state after state.

ayahs.indonesian: Maka mengapa mereka tidak mau beriman?
ayahs.english: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,

ayahs.arabic: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ
ayahs.transliteration: Waitha quriAAa AAalayhimu alquranu la yasjudoona
ayahs.indonesian: dan apabila Al-Qur'an dibacakan kepada mereka, mereka tidak bersujud?
ayahs.english: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?

ayahs.indonesian: Bahkan orang-orang kafir itu mendustakan (nya).
ayahs.english: But those who have disbelieved deny,

ayahs.indonesian: Padahal Allah mengetahui apa yang mereka sembunyikan (dalam hati mereka).
ayahs.english: But Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.

ayahs.indonesian: Maka beri kabar gembira kepada mereka dengan azab yang pedih,
ayahs.english: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,

ayahs.arabic: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
ayahs.transliteration: Illa allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati lahum ajrun ghayru mamnoon
ayahs.indonesian: kecuali orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan, mereka akan mendapat pahala yang tidak ada putus-putusnya.
ayahs.english: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
